form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: CWC Diarrhoea> Severe persistent diarrhoea plus severe or some dehydration

field.name: Severe Persistent Diarrhoea Plus Severe or Some Dehydration | Take Action
If child also has other severe disease in addition to dehydration, refer mother/caregiver and child to a health center or hospital IMMEDIATELY
If child also does NOT have other severe disease, treat dehydration before referral, as given below.
Give recommended amount of ORS over 4-hour period in your facility:
Prepare ORS to give during the first 4-hour period
If the child wants more ORS than recommended, give more
Show the mother/caregiver how to give ORS:
Give frequent small sips from a clean cup
If the child vomits, wait 10 minutes. Then continue, but more slowly
If the child wants more ORS than recommended, give more
Refer mother/caregiver and child to a health center or hospital IMMEDIATELY
